snippet: A convoy of thousands of Muslims was turned back because peacekeepers feared that they would be attacked on their way through some parts of the capital, Bangui.
abstract: Thousands of Muslims who tried to flee the violence in Central African Republic capital Bangui are turned back by peacekeepers as crowds of Christians shout threats.
lead_paragraph: A convoy of thousands of Muslims was turned back because peacekeepers feared that they would be attacked on their way through some parts of the capital, Bangui.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Muslims Try to Flee but Are Turned Back
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Muslims Try to Flee but Are Turned Back
